sentences.sContent: Its colors are green, magenta, orange and blue.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its colors are green, magenta, orange and blue.
sentences.sCn: 它的颜色是绿色，品红色，橙色以及蓝色。

sentences.sContent: I painted the previously white trim dark green and the doors this insane magenta.
sentences.sContent_eng: I painted the previously white trim dark green and the doors this insane magenta.
sentences.sCn: 原来白色的门框被我涂成了深绿色，门则是这种品红色。

sentences.sContent: Green and red light mix to produce yellow, red and blue light mix to produce magenta, green and blue mix to produce cyan.
sentences.sContent_eng: Green and red light mix to produce yellow, red and blue light mix to produce magenta, green and blue mix to produce cyan.
sentences.sCn: 绿光和红光叠加可产生黄色，红光与蓝光叠加可产生品红色，绿光与蓝光叠加可产生青绿色。

synos.tran: [染料]品红；洋红；红色苯胺染料
洋红色的；[染料]品红色的
